row.content: @covid_priest Έμαθα πως πήγε και ο Γκίκας στο #CROI2023. Άραγε πήγε αμάσκωτος ή εκεί δεν τον παίρνει και φόρεσε μασκούλα; (Τέλος της πανδημίας and all that jazz)

#CROI2023
The findings shared at #CROI2023 already making waves. #DoxyPEP is very in. CDC has posted considerations for the use of DoxyPEP. What does everyone think? #IDTwitter https://t.co/HLvJf3IJtu

New data at #CROI2023 demonstrates the role antivirals play in COVID-19 disease treatment, helping inform clinical practice decisions for patients, including vulnerable and immunocompromised populations.

🎧A l'antenne de @franceinfo ce matin à 7 h 41, Yazdan Yazdanpanah, en direct de la #CROI2023, revient sur le 3e cas de guérison du #VIH (@institutpasteur @asiersc) et les pistes que cela ouvre pour la recherche de guérison/rémission du #virus :

Margarita Breakfast Clubs (MBCs) are back for #CROI2023 and kick-off today at 7:00 AM PST! MBCs are daily Zoom conversations to discuss the hottest CROI topics in an informal way. CROI registration not required. Register and learn more here! ⤵️ https://t.co/s3Q1HsrUe6 https://t.co/NFuJwsER8n

Absolutely stirring #MartinDelaney lecture at #CROI2023 taking the scientific community, policy makers and global health funders to task
We can't end HIV without centering the voices and needs of people with #HIV particularly black women with HIV.
Thank you #YvetteRaphael. https://t.co/hFKPEmD0lO

Tony Fauci is always terrific at putting the science and history into context -- but it is so great to hear him at #CROI2023 specifically speaking to the next generation. More from  Tony on the future at https://t.co/IJgvCxj0oU

‘Undetectable = Untransmittable (U=U) really is a scientific fact…’

Après trois années en virtuel, la Croi revient en présentiel du 19 au 22 février à Seattle (États-Unis). Nos envoyés spéciaux Bruno Spire et Fred Lebreton sont sur place pour Seronet. Retour sur la plénière d’ouverture de l'édition 2023.

The 30th Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections (CROI) starts this weekend! Join us for livestreams with @HHSgov HIV leadership discussing the latest HIV research starting 2/20. We'll be streaming here, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube. #CROI2023 https://t.co/GhEM77e7Dv
Are you attending #CROI2023 ? Catch Dr. Ingrid Bassett’s poster at today’s session at 2:30 pm PST / 5:30 pm EST!
